document_data.name: ''Skeleton Key''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Skeleton keys''''' were [[enchanted]] [[thieves' tools]] from the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: These keys magically changed their shapes to fit any lock. Their magic ensured that only [[rogue]]s and [[thieves]] could put them to use.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, various ''skeleton keys'' could be found in possession of thieves, scoundrels, criminals, and, of course, [[adventurer]]s in the [[Sword Mountains]], [[Neverwinter Wood]], the city of [[Neverwinter]], and [[Helm's Hold]], and could be found in the ruins of [[Illefarn]].
